## About Me

🖖 **Hello! I'm JEleniel**

I'm a developer and architect passionate about creating accessible tools for specialized needs, such as the neurodivergent and disabled communities (I'm a member of both). My experience spans software architecture, data engineering, and development, giving me a holistic view of how to design secure, scalable solutions. Skilled in numerous languages — x86 assembly, C, C++, C#, Python, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript, and beyond — I focus on building versatile, open-source projects that streamline workflows and enhance accessibility for everyone.

I believe in transparency, integrity, and rationality, I strive to craft solutions based on present value rather than speculation. I see the world through patterns and systems, an approach that shapes both my work and my philosophy. 

## My Current Projects

- 🤖 I'm building a complex, multi-agent Artificial Intelligence (AI) using LLM and Embed models with Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).
- 🐀 [Bizarre Friends](https://github.com/Nibbles-and-Mlems-Exotics-LLC/bizarre-friends) is a user-friendly, cross-platform tool tailored for breeders of all kinds of animals.
- 🧠 Neruodivergent Networking will be a set of tools to help neurodivergent people (like myself) navigate the world of business networking and career progression.

## My Current Games

- 🧛‍♂️ [Vampire Survivors](https://poncle.itch.io/vampire-survivors)
- [Dragonball Sparking ZERO](https://www.bandainamcoent.com/games/dragon-ball-sparking-zero)
